title: Bug 4974: Setting classpath/output location should be one operation
description: When attempting to set the output location and classpath in the project settings, an error message is displayed stating 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This issue arises because setting the output location and classpath are treated as two separate operations, resulting in an illegal state being created.
OB: After pressing 'Ok', an error message is displayed with the following text: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'.
EB: After pressing 'Ok', the output location and classpath should be set successfully without any error message.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the project settings.
2. Attempt to set the output location and classpath separately.
3. Press 'Ok'.
4. Observe the error message that states 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'.
